item.title: Does anyone know how to make an npc say ur online?
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

means ive missed a { or } hold on

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {
						if (misc.random2(10) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
						if(server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(server.playerHandler..players[i].playerName.equals("PLAYERNAME")) == true){
							npcs[i].textUpdate = server.playerHandler..players[i].playerName+"Is Online";
						}
						}
					}

Read full topic

item.title: Does anyone know how to make an npc say ur online?
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

search it your client for “moo”

should show tht

if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) {
						if (misc.random2(50) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo";
						}
					}

put it under it

							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;

							npcs[i].textUpdate = server.playerHandler..players[i].playerName+"Is Online;

post errors if there are any
